summary: Completed testing of GameShop Nepal Referral & Multiplier features. All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend admin pages loading and displaying data properly.
critical_code_review_comments: Rate limiting is aggressive (30 login attempts/minute) - may affect user experience during testing but good for security
seed_data_creation: Active multiplier event 'Double Points Week' with 2x multiplier (2026-01-01 to 2027-12-31) was pre-created
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Rate limiting may cause 429 errors if too many login attempts are made in quick succession (30/minute limit). Wait 60 seconds between test batches if hitting rate limits.

daily_rewards_page.details: Shows login prompt for unauthenticated users, displays Daily Rewards title and How it works section

admin_login.details: Login with gsnadmin/gsnadmin works correctly, redirects to dashboard

admin_referral_page.details: Loads correctly, shows Referrer Reward (Rs 50), New User Reward (Rs 25), Enable toggle, Save Settings button

admin_multiplier_page.details: Loads correctly, shows active 'Double Points Week' 2x event, All Events list with status badges, Create Event button

api_multiplier_active.details: GET /api/multiplier/active returns is_active=true, name='Double Points Week', multiplier=2

api_multiplier_events_admin.details: GET /api/multiplier/events (with admin token) returns list of all events
